summary: Athens is Greece's capital and largest city, with a rich history spanning over 3,400 years. Named after the goddess Athena, it was an ancient powerhouse, known for democracy and art. Today, it's a bustling metropolis and Greece's economic hub. The city boasts ancient landmarks like the Parthenon and is home to many museums. Athens has also hosted the Olympic Games twice, in 1896 and 2004, joining an elite group of cities. Its urban area is one of the largest in the European Union, with a population of over 3 million.
title: Athens
